ComicInfo.Title: Laff and Let Die; You Know Your Stars Are All Screwed Up When...; Cracked Interviews the Housing King; Celebrity Garage Sale; A Cracked Look at High School; Making Plain Ads Sensational; The Hitler Nostalgia Craze; When America Runs Out of Electricity; If Real Life Were Like the Movies; Silly Jack
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Stanley tries to carve the world's biggest spear.
Suggestions on how to take advantage of the nostlagic interest in Adolph Hitler, such as adding him to the cast of Andy Capp, putting him on television westerns and using his image on bubblegum cards.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:41:09. [Issue ID 250477]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues, John Severin, Murray Ball, Don Orehek, Bernard Baily, Bill Ward, John Langton
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues, John Severin, Murray Ball, Don Orehek, Bernard Baily, Bill Ward, John Langton
